lighting: Warm interior lighting with golden sunlight streaming through windows

characters.name: Morgan
characters.position: Left side of frame, seated on couch

key_props.name: Antique key
key_props.description: Brass ornate key with distinctive engravings
key_props.placement: On coffee table, partially visible under newspaper

key_props.name: Family photo
key_props.description: Framed photo showing Alex as a child with parents

shot_list.description: Establishing shot of living room with both characters
Alex examining the book, looking concerned
shot_list.framing: Mid-shot focusing on Alex's upper body and face

shot_list.description: Morgan's reaction as Alex reveals information
The key partially visible under newspaper
shot_list.framing: Extreme close-up of coffee table surface

scene_description: Alex discovers a hidden page in the old book that mentions the significance of the key. Morgan remains skeptical but intrigued. The key on the coffee table is momentarily visible when Alex gestures emphatically, causing the newspaper to shift.
continuity_notes: Morgan's coffee mug should be half-empty, consistent with previous scene
Sunlight angle should match the established time of day
Alex's watch should show approximately 5:20 PM
